timeline.message: Add health checker for cluster management module
Add health check for localhost or 127.0.0.1
Refactor move healthChecker to init constructor, move check duplicate addresses to OAPNodeChecker
refactor move all check health logic to OAPNodeChecker
Fix mockito class not found exception
Fix dependency check bug, can't call moduleManager.find in provider prepare method

timeline.bodyText:
THREAD_SAFETY_VIOLATION:  Unprotected write. Non-private method ZookeeperCoordinator.queryRemoteNodes() indirectly writes to field this.healthChecker outside of synchronization.
Reporting because another access to the same memory occurs on a background thread, although this access may not.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText:
THREAD_SAFETY_VIOLATION:  Unprotected write. Non-private method ZookeeperCoordinator.setHealthChecker(...) writes to field this.healthChecker outside of synchronization.
Reporting because another access to the same memory occurs on a background thread, although this access may not.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift

timeline.bodyText: Move final to following other final fields in the top of the list.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: You don't need the setter I think. Please don't open unnecessary access.
timeline.author: wu-sheng
